primevc.core.dispatcher.IUnbindable

type
interface
Either a signal, a group of signals, or anything else that can unbind.

Instance Methods

unbind(listener : Dynamic, ?handler : T) : Void

parameters
listener Handler owner object
?handler Handler method. When handler == null, all methods owned by listener will be unbound.
Unbind all handlers for the given listener object, or when a handler != null: unbound that specific handler.

unbindAll() : Void
